title: Miao Xiansheng
synopsis: Adapted from a short tale from self-made animator Bu Sifan, writer and director of Dahufa, the feature introduces a fictional golden-colored flower, which possesses the magical ability to debauch humans who get too close to it.
related_anime: ['Miao Xiansheng: Huo Ze Kui Xiao Ren Chuan', 'Miao Xiansheng: Yan Luo Dadao']
